Sentencas: This article is concerned with the electrochemical properties of La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF) as a cathode with respect to its calcination temperature in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To determine these properties, LSCF powder was synthesized using a modified glycine nitrate process (GNP), followed by calcinations from 1073 K to 1373 K.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Its X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns gradually sharpened as the calcination temperature increased.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Also, the specific surface area of the powder decreased due to particle sintering as the calcination temperature increased.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Scanning electronic microscopy (SEM) images from calcined LSCF powder at various temperatures show that the particle shapes are quite similar.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the particle size slightly increased with increasing calcination temperature.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrode with LSCF powder calcined at 1273 K showed a lower area specific resistance (ASR) value of 0.68 Omega cm(2) at 973 K than the electrode using commercial LSCF powder.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the effect of the sieving process of the cathode powder after wet ball milling on its electrochemical properties was investigated in detail.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: From particle size analysis, it was observed that the sieved powder, after wet ball milling, shows a bi-modal particle size distribution, whereas the unsieved powder had a single mode distribution.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The LSCF electrode with unsieved powder showed a 5 times smaller ASR value than that with the sieved powder.
Titulo: Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells
Effect of calcination temperature on electrochemical properties of cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells
